title: Quantum.Leap.Season.4.HQ.x264.ac3.subs-MCH
description:

But if you aren't worried about space, and want a higher quality, to output to a t.v. or such, then this is for you.  I've previewed the episodes and they look and sound great on a 50 inch LCD/surround sound system.

------------------------

Hope you enjoy!!

Please seed when you are done...a good rule of thumb is to upload at least as much as you've downloaded (1 to 1 ratio)...thanks!
